mapper.insert: INSERT INTO table_meta(connect_id, schema_name, catalog_name, table_name, comment, num_rows, column_list, index_list) VALUES (#{connectId}, #{schema}, #{catalog}, #{tableName}, #{comment}, #{numRows}, #{columnListJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{indexListJson, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
